Name: White Elephant
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dust with freshly grated nutmeg (or chocolate powder).
Review: Smooth and creamy with a hint of chocolate.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of White Elephant contains 219 calories
